fullText:
Group Vigor

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Half-elf
Benefit: When one of your allies within 10 squares of you spends a healing surge to regain hit points, he or she regains 1 additional hit point. The additional hit points gained increase to 2 at 11th level, and 3 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 385, page(s) 68.
name: Group Vigor
